greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: a(n) = A082893(n)/n.
comment: Checked for the first 120000 terms to be the same as A079416. - _R. J. Mathar_, Sep 17 2008
link: Robert Israel, A079416 = A082896, Posting to Seqfan mailing list, Oct 30, 2019
formula: a(n) = floor((floor(n/2) + p(n))/n), where p(n) is the n-th prime.
results.author: _Labos Elemer_, Apr 22 2003
